contextId.information: This is repeated for emphasis. AT: "which we ourselves have seen" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_parallelism]])
contextId.quote: which we have seen ... we have looked at

contextId.information: These two phrases mean basically the same thing. John uses them to emphasize that God will surely forgive our sins. AT: "and will completely forgive us of what we have done wrong" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_parallelism]])
contextId.quote: to forgive us our sins and cleanse us from all unrighteousness
